summary: The iPad is a popular tablet computer made by Apple. It was first released in 2010 and has since become the best-selling tablet brand. There are different types of iPads, like the iPad Mini and iPad Pro. The iPad uses a special operating system called iPadOS, which is based on Apple's iOS. This system is designed to work well with the iPad's larger screen. People use iPads for many things, such as games, work, school, and even in hospitals. You can connect to the internet using Wi-Fi or cellular networks, and there are many accessories available, like a special pen (Apple Pencil) and keyboards.
title: IPad
